newsitem.title: USA: Gensia to name Panoz to non-executive post.
newsitem.headline: Gensia to name Panoz to non-executive post.

text.p: Donald Panoz is expected to be appointed non-executive chairman of the board after Gensia Inc shareholders approve the acquisition of Rakepoll Holding B.V.
The combined company will be called Gensia Sicor Inc.
Panoz retired in December 1996 as chairman of the board of Elan Corp, a company which he founded and served as its chief executive until January 1995.

A special meeting of Gensia stockholders is scheduled for February 26 to approve, among other proposals, the issuance of 29.5 million shares of Gensia common stock to Rakepoll Finance N.V. for the acquisition of Rakepoll Holding B.V., parent company of three specialty pharmaceutical businesses.
